text: Beaumetz-lès-Aire is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts- de-France region in northern France. ==Geography== A village located 12 miles (18 km) south of Saint-Omer, at the junction of the D92, D130 and D159 roads. ==Population== ==Sights== * The nineteenth century church of St. John. ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais
title: Beaumetz-lès-Aire
